title: Was Heimerdinger used in MSI?
body:
Cos theres a metric ton of them around now?

His complete lane domination and un-gankability, is annoying, but can be tolerated when he isn't picked very often. But now theres suddenly a lot more around, out of nowhere.

Are the Pros and their herd to blame again? or am I just getting unlucky?

replies.body: Reminds me of Orianna. She's everywhere now and that annoys me. He ability to zone, trade, and play defensively in lane makes her hard to beat.

Yea Ori is one of the champions that no matter what I do, I just cant seem to play well against her.
Alongside Fizz and Ahri.

>
> Yea Ori is one of the champions that no matter what I do, I just cant seem to play well against her.
> Alongside Fizz and Ahri.

I can't touch Ori. I will literally lose to a Bronze5 Ori, no matter what I do. Currently saving up for her and I'm gonna play her and learn how she works.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Wfb9zlwU,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-05-11T05:47:38.952+0000)
>
> I'm gonna play her and learn how she works.

Ive been doing exactly that one and off for the past **month**.
Im yet to find a consistently exploitable weakness...

Even as Azir, Sol and Taliyah, I just cant do much against Ori. Literally, often the most I can do, is just not feed. It's really frustrating.

Play Fizz, hold your E for her shockwave then go all in on her.

She's very low mobility and hard CC basically shuts her down.
That requires playing Fizz though :P haha xD

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Wfb9zlwU,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-11T05:55:41.756+0000)
>
> Ive been doing exactly that one and off for the past **month**.
> Im yet to find a consistently exploitable weakness...
> 
> Even as Azir, Sol and Taliyah, I just cant do much against Ori. Literally, often the most I can do, is just not feed. It's really frustrating.

I think I've got 3 or 4 games with her and the only time I do badly is if I'm versing someone like Katarina who has insane mobility and can just jump straight on me. I could have sworn Azir countered Orianna due to his better trading and zoning, but you just never know. I had no luck with Taliyah, either.

The recent AP item changes just made Ori so much worse to deal with.

Yea but champs with high mobility and damage like Kat kinda counter most champs anyway. :P

The thing with Azir is that he has to stand relatively still for his poke (WQ +2 autos), because he needs to auto.
Where as Ori can tap QW and then move away, and her spells will automatically activate when they reach the target location.
This means that she can move away from Azir's poke with no repercussions, but Azir cant really get away from hers without sacrificing his own damage. it's the same with champs like Ziggs and Xerath, anyone who can match his level of poke from a distance gives him grief, because he is a stationary target while poking, while all they need to do is chuck and run.

Obviously the longer the fight goes on, the more of an advantage Azir gets, as he is one of the few AP champions to be able to trade autos with Ori effectively. But she has so much damage the fight doesn't last too long.

If I had to vs Ori, as one of my mains, I would rather it be Taliyah, she is the one I'm best with _(probably because she is easiest)_ she is tanky enough to survive the first QW combo occasionally, arguably the most mobile of the 3, and her damage output is much burstier than Azir and Sol, so she can get rid of most of Ori's health before the next QW barrage.
But I still have trouble. 

Yea, I despise that Banshees Veil gives AP now. I think that was a huge mistake, it gives power to all the wrong champions.
Play Syndra. She fucks poor Donger ðŸ˜”

I Already play Azir, he does pretty well himself :P

But Its the poor jungler that has the hard time... :S

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Wfb9zlwU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-05-11T05:13:38.836+0000)
>
> I Already play Azir, he does pretty well himself :P
> 
> But Its the poor jungler that has the hard time... :S

The best tip I can give is to never gank a Heim, no matter how juicy it may seem. Tell him to focus on other lanes and get them ahead and just play safe. Bad and generic advice, I know, but that's how you deal with Heim. He can easily 1v2 early and mid game.

He hasn't been picked anywhere internationally as far as I'm aware. Hjarnan plays him a bit in EU but even he doesn't seem to bust him out in EULCS or anything.

He's traditionally good into tanks early because he just bullies the living hell out of them when they try to farm but I've had games where I was 0/4 into him as a Poppy and he's ended up like 4/15 because once you get a bit of tankiness he's just got nothing to get you with.

Riot have hinted that Heimer's getting some changes in patch 7.10 so if anything you'll probably see a spike in his annoying af mini turrets.
